title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP discusses which NFL team may overachieve this season. Sports Illustrated's Pat Forde calls in to discuss which Universities could be switching conferences. Plus, former NBA player Jamal Crawford explains how he gets NBA stars to play at his Pro-Am.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
